results.title: Simvastatin interferes with process outgrowth and branching of oligodendrocytes.
results.text_hl: Moreover, expression of specific myelin markers, such as @GENE_MBP @GENE_24547 @@@myelin basic protein@@@, @GENE_MAG @GENE_29409 @@@myelin-associated glycoprotein@@@, and @GENE_MOG @GENE_24558 @@@myelin oligodendrocyte glycoprotein@@@, was compromised after treatment. We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment has detrimental effects on OLG process outgrowth, the prior step in (re)myelination, thereby mortgaging long-term healing of @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS lesions@@@.

citations.NLM: Smolders I, Smets I, Maier O, vandeVen M, Steels P, Ameloot M. Simvastatin interferes with process outgrowth and branching of oligodendrocytes. J Neurosci Res. 2010 Nov 15;88(15):3361-75. PMID: 20857509
